mapper.insert: insert into info (jid, mid, recruit_field, user_education, salary, min_salary, max_salary, regist_date, close_date, re_title, career, work_type, emp_type_code, today, dday) VALUES (#{jid}, #{mid}, #{recruitField}, #{userEducation}, #{salary}, #{minSalary}, #{maxSalary}, #{registDate}, #{closeDate}, #{reTitle}, #{career}, #{workType}, #{empTypeCode}, #{today}, #{dday})
mapper.select: select b.bizname, b.brno, TO_CHAR(b.LOGO_IMG) as LOGO_IMG, i.* from info i join business b on i.mid = b.mid order by i.post_date desc
select b.bizname, b.brno, TO_CHAR(b.LOGO_IMG) as LOGO_IMG, i.* from info i join business b on i.mid = b.mid order by i.count desc
mapper.update: update info set count = count+1 where jid=#{jid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.dday, i.re_title, b.bizname, i.jid FROM info i JOIN business b ON i.mid = b.mid WHERE i.dday > 1 ORDER BY i.dday ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 2

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.dday, i.re_title, b.bizname, i.jid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY i.dday ASC) AS row_num FROM info i JOIN business b ON i.mid = b.mid WHERE i.dday > 1 ) WHERE row_num >= 3 and row_num <= 4

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.dday, i.re_title, b.bizname, i.jid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY i.dday ASC) AS row_num FROM info i JOIN business b ON i.mid = b.mid WHERE i.dday > 1 ) WHERE row_num >= 5 and row_num <= 6

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.dday, i.re_title, b.bizname, i.jid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY i.dday ASC) AS row_num FROM info i JOIN business b ON i.mid = b.mid WHERE i.dday > 1 ) WHERE row_num >= 7 and row_num <= 8

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.dday, i.re_title, b.bizname, i.jid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY i.dday ASC) AS row_num FROM info i JOIN business b ON i.mid = b.mid WHERE i.dday > 1 ) WHERE row_num >= 9 and row_num <= 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.dday, i.re_title, b.bizname, i.jid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY i.dday ASC) AS row_num FROM info i JOIN business b ON i.mid = b.mid WHERE i.dday > 1 ) WHERE row_num >= 11 and row_num <= 12
select * from (select b.bno, b.btitle, to_char(b.bcontent) as BC, b.mid, b.likehit from board b join board_like l on b.bno = l.bno order by b.likehit desc) where rownum <= 1

SELECT scrap_count, i.*, b.bizname, bf.bform_name FROM info i JOIN ( SELECT s.jid, COUNT(s.jid) AS scrap_count FROM scrap s WHERE s.is_scrap_action = 'true' GROUP BY s.jid ORDER BY scrap_count DESC ) max_scrap_jid ON i.jid = max_scrap_jid.jid JOIN business b ON i.mid = b.mid JOIN businessform bf ON b.bform = bf.bform WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.*, b.bizname, bf.bform_name FROM info i JOIN business b ON i.mid = b.mid JOIN businessform bf ON b.bform = bf.bform ORDER BY i.count DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.*, b.bizname, bf.bform, TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(salary, '[^0-9]', '')) AS numeric_salary FROM info i JOIN business b ON i.mid = b.mid JOIN businessform bf ON b.bform = bf.bform ORDER BY numeric_salary DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.*, a.JID, a.BIZNAME, TO_CHAR(a.logo_img) as LOGO_IMAGE, a.USER_EDUCATION, a.SALARY , a.MIN_SALARY, a.MAX_SALARY, a.REGIST_DATE, a.CLOSE_DATE, a.RE_TITLE , a.CAREER, a.WORK_TYPE, a.EMP_TYPE_CODE, a.TODAY, a.DDAY , TO_CHAR(a.JPOSTDETAIL) AS JPOSTDETAIL, a.BADDRESS , a.BFORM, a.BFORM_NAME, a.COUNT FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM BUSINESS b JOIN BUSINESSFORM b2 USING (bform))c JOIN INFO i USING (mid)) a JOIN "RFIELD" r ON r.RECRUIT_FIELD = a.RECRUIT_FIELD order by post_date desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
